meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the macronucleus.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the macronuclear changes in the cell.
meanings.sent2: The macronuclear structure plays a crucial role in cell division.
meanings.sent3: The macronuclear dance party was a hit among the tiny organisms.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was like a macronuclear force, guiding the team.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the macronuclear nucleus stood out under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the larger of two types of nuclei found in ciliate protozoans.
meanings.sent1: The macronuclear nucleus contains important genetic information.
meanings.sent2: Ciliate protozoans rely on their macronuclear structure for survival.
meanings.sent3: The macronuclear race between the organisms was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His voice boomed like a macronuclear presence in the room.
meanings.sent5: The macronuclear powerhouse fueled the growth of the tiny organism.
